item.title: cv
item.description:
Education

  • 2012 - present: Ph. D. in Mechanical Engineering, Vanderbilt University, Nashville, TN, USA
  • 2010 - 2012: M. Sc. in Mechanical Engineering, Columbia University, New York, NY, USA
  • 2006 - 2010: B. Sc. in Mechanical Engineering, Tsinghua University, Beijing, China

Contact

(615)-343-0607
Olin Hall Room 101
2400 Highland Avenue
Nashville, TN  37212

Research Interests

  • Design, control & telemanipulation of continuum robots.
  • Calibration and modeling of continuum robots.
  • Robot hybrid force motion control.

Projects

  • Intelligent Flexible Robots for Safe Manipulation of Anatomy
  • Calibration of continuum robots
  • Hybrid force motion control for exploration using a Cartesian robot and da Vinci research kit robots.
  • Telemanipulation control using virtual fixture of the Puma robot.

Peer Reviewed Journal Papers

  • Simaan, N., Bajo, A., Reiter, A., Wang, L., Allen, P. & Fowler, D. (2013). Lessons learned using the insertable robotic effector platform (IREP) for single port access surgery. Journal of Robotic Surgery. Special Issue: Hamlyn Symposium 2012]. ResearchGate Link
  • Groom, K., Wang, L., Simaan, N. & Netterville, J. (2015). Robot-Assisted Trans-nasal Laryngoplasty in Cadaveric Models: Quantifying Forces and Identifying Challenges. The Laryngoscope, 125(5), 166-168. ResearchGate Link

Peer Reviewed Conference Papers

  • Wang, L., Chen, Z., Chalasani, P., Pile, J., Kazanzides, P., Talor, R. H., Simaan, N., ”Updating Virtual Fixtures From Exploration Data in Force-controlled Model-based Telemanipulation,” International Design Engineering Technical Conferences and Computers and Information in Engineering Conference (ASME IDETC), Charlotte, NC, USA, 2016 (accepted).
  • Wang, L. & Simaan, N (2014). Investigation of Error Propagation in Multi-Backbone Continuum Robots. In Advances in Robot Kinematics, pages 385-394. Springer International Publishing.
  • Bajo, A., Goldman, R. E., Wang, L., Fowler, D. & Simaan, N (2012). Integration and Preliminary Evaluation of an Insertable Robotic Effectors Platform for Single Port Access Surgery. In International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA’2012), pages 3381-3387. [finalist best medical robotics paper] I’m an inline-style link
  • Roy, R., Wang, L. & Simaan, N (2015). Investigation of Effects of Dynamics on Intrinsic Wrench Sensing in Continuum Robots. In International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA’2016), [finalist best medical robotics paper].
  • Chalasani, P., Wang, L., Roy, R., Simaan, N. & Taylor, R. H (2016). Concurrent Nonparametric Estimation of Organ Geometry and Tissue Stiffness Using Continuous Adaptive Palpation. InInternational Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA’2016), in press.
  • Ayvali, E., Srivatsan, A., Wang, L., Roy, R., Simaan, N. & Choset, H (2016). Using Bayesian Optimization to Guide Probing of a Flexible Environment for Simultaneous Registration and Stiffness Mapping. In International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA’2016), in press.
  • Srinivasan, A., Ayvali, E., Wang, L., Roy, R., Simaan, N. & Choset, H (2016). Complementary model update: A method for simultaneous registration and stiffness mapping in flexible environments. In International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA’2016), in press.
  • Long Wang, Joseph DelPreto, Sam Bhattacharyya, Jonathan Weisz, and Peter K. Allen, “A highly-underactuated robotic hand with force and joint angle sensors”, IEEE/RSJ Inter. Conf. IROS 2011, San Francisco, California, USA, pp 1380 - 1385, 2011.
  • Long Wang, Wenzeng Zhang, Yuming Ye, et al. “The indirect style under-actuated robotic finger with tendon-slider mechanisms,” in Proc. IEEE Inter. Conf. Robio 2009, Guilin, China, pp 1790 - 1795, 2009.
  • Wenzeng Zhang, Long Wang, Li Hao, et al. “An indirect style linkage under-actuated humanoid robot hand,” 2010 IEEE Informatics in Control, Automation and Robotics (CAR), Wuhan, China, pp 421 - 424, 2010.
  • Wenzeng Zhang, Jie Sun, Deyang Zhao, Long Wang, “A Novel Coupled and Self-adaptive Under-actuated Multi-fingered Hand with Gear-rack-slider Mechanism,” in Proc. IEEE Inter. Conf. 9th International Conference on Frontiers of Design and Manufacturing Science, Changsha, China.

Activities

  • Teaching assistant of graduate class [Robot Manipulator] and undergraduate class [System Dynamics]
  • Former leader of Tsinghua University Concert Band (2007-2009).
  • Tsinghua University outstanding student leaders (2006).
  • Tsinghua University Arts scholarship (2008).
